title: FLAVOR Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: 1 a(1) : the quality of something that affects the sense of taste the spicy flavor of Thai food (2) : a particular type of taste my favorite flavor of ice cream (3) : a good or appealing taste The dish is full of flavor. c : the blend of taste and smell sensations evoked by a substance in the mouth the flavor of apples 2 : a substance that flavors artificial flavors 3 a : characteristic or predominant quality the artsy flavor of a neighborhood b : a distinctive appealing or enlivening quality Her performance adds flavor to the show. 4 a b : a property that distinguishes different types of elementary particles (such as quarks or neutrinos) also : any of the different types of particles that are distinguished by flavor 5 : version sense 2 flavors of software 6 : one that is in the center of public attention for a limited time â€”usually used in phrases like flavor of the month Love words? Need even more definitions? Merriam-Webster unabridged
